text:
@realDonaldTrump donald trump* claims to know more than the experts about the Coronavirus. In his opinion the virus will disappear in April when the weather warms up.
Do you trust donald trump’s* word? 
Do you trust his Stepford VP Mike Pence?
#Lyingtrump* #EndtrumpAmerikkka https://t.co/UnCJwN06w5

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
